title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4002.3 - Stable employee defined
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4002.3 - Stable employee defined

State Regulations

The term stable employee shall be deemed to include an
authorized agent, subagent, stable manager and any other employee of a licensed
owner associated with such owner's racing activities, except as otherwise in
sections 4002.1 through
4002.3
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4002.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
